page: AE40029: Random Vibration In Aerospace Engineering

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21004, AE31002, AE31005 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsIntroduction to probability theory, random variables, random processes, response of a system to random excitation: linear discrete, linear continuous and non-linear discrete and continuous systems, response of a random system to deterministic and random excitation, failure to random vibrations, application to aerospace structures.
page: AE40029: Random Vibration In Aerospace Engineering
